title: Albert Einstein defined insanity as doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results. When have you gone insane by this standard? - Quora

response.answer_text: Albert Einstein defined insanity as doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results. When have you gone insane by this standard? Rephrasing the question: Lawrence Goethe defined insanity as Humanity doing the same thing over and over again and expecting Humanity to improve. When did Humanity go insane by this standard? 2000 years ago and the insanity has been increasing exponentially since then and now the Polar Bears have no homes to go to and nor do the Eskimos. However, the up-side is that a lot of people purchased the rubbish that they have been brain-washed into believing that they could not live without. Soon they will find out that they can live without it because they will have to. © 2019 Lawrence Goethe ~ Wrath of God Against The Imbeciles

Whenever I have tried to make sense of any POLICY, whose implicit mandate is ‘try this way until you succeed.’ CLEARLY, Dr. Einstein did NOT have an M.B.A., or he would have been so immersed in the ‘try longer-try harder’ philosophy of the Human Potential Movement as to be incapable of his memorable insight that is rendered in your question.
